lines.text: "And then time has passed and then followed its own course" and so and so. No one in their perfect mind would write such narrative. It would be like trying to hold a single note or just one accord for a whole hour and call it music.
When philosophy paints an image of grey in grey, life disappears. The grey doesn't become younger. It's almost imperceptible.
Now that the Cold War is over, to be an American is useless.
